sections.title: Master of Applied Computing
sections.text:
University of Windsor • Windsor, ON, Canada



Sep 2024 - Present



Relevant Courses: Advanced Computing Concepts, Advanced Networking and Cybersecurity, Advanced Systems Programming, Advanced Database Techniques, Advanced Software Engineering, Internet Applications and Distributed Systems

sections.title: Bachelor of Engineering, Computer Science
sections.text:
Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering • Tamil Nadu, India



Aug 2018 - Jun 2022



Relevant Courses: Data Structures, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Theory of Computation, Database Management System, Data Mining and Data Warehousing, Operating Systems, Computer Networks, Cryptography and Network Security, Software Engineering, Internet of Things and its Applications, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning Techniques, User Interface Technologies, Mobile Computing
